    def execute_sql(self, sql_str):
        try:
            db = pymysql.connect(host=self.dbhost, port=self.dbport, user=self.db_user, passwd=self.pwd, db=self.dbname,

            data = cursor.fetchone()
            data = self.bytes_to_str(data[0])
            return data
